name: Memory of Torenia 思念的夏堇花
detailed_description:
Memory of Torenia is a warm and healing visual novel.
In the spring of the second semester of Senior two, Zou Jin met her new classmate named Zhuge Xia and they became deskmates. Completely different in personality, they should have been strangers to each other. But because of an accident, Zhuge Xia told Zou Jin that she wanted to build a good relationship…

Character

Zou Jin
A student of Class 1, Senior Grade 2, No. 1 middle school of B city, serving as the math class representative and the commissary in charge of studies in the class. Disciplined and strict, even a little bit aggressive, but there seems to be something hidden in her heart...


Zhuge Xia
A student of Class 1, Senior Grade 2, No. 1 middle school of B city. Absent from school for half a year due to ill health, but now return to school. Soft and tend to choose what she doesn’t like to avoid trouble.


Mr.Zhuge
Zhuge Xia's father, a gentle, fat middle-aged man. Lost his wife in his early age, he lives with his Xia alone.


Head Teacher
The head teacher of Zou Jin's class who teaches mathematics. Serious and responsible, very attentive to students.


Zou Jin's Grandma
Zou Jin's grandmother, stubborn and along with gender.

short_description: Memory of Torenia is a warm and healing visual novel.In the spring of the second semester of Senior two, Zou Jin met her new classmate named Zhuge Xia and they became deskmates. Completely different in personality, they should have been strangers to each other.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows XP
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4 2.4GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 2000
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E8200
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 560SE
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

legal_notice:
一、游戏中原创的立绘、CG、音乐等素材，未经允许禁止挪用。

二、游戏中引用的音乐、音效、图像素材，著作权归原作者所有，如果需要使用，请到原站点自行下载并按照使用规约使用。

三、禁止任何团体或者个人对游戏进行二次发布。

四、违反上述声明，后果自负。
